title: Dollar closes in on Rs. 300/-
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The selling rate of the US dollar closed in on Rs. 300/- at most of the licenses commercial banks, while the buying price was Rs. 289/-, per dollar.
Here are the exchange rates of other currencies, as per the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL),
NO intention of appointing Ranil Wickremesinghe as Prime Minister – SLPP
Indian External Affairs Minister goes to LIOC filling station in Colombo
